abort: Occurs when the loading of an audio/video is aborted
animationEnd: Occurs when a CSS animation has completed
animationIteration: Occurs when a CSS animation is repeated
animationStart: Occurs when a CSS animation has started
blur: Occurs when an element loses focus
canplay: Occurs when the browser can start playing the audio/video
canplaythrough: Occurs when the browser can play through the audio/video without stopping
change: Occurs when the content of an element has changed (for <input>, <select>, and <textarea>)
click: Occurs when an element is clicked
contextmenu: Occurs when the user right-clicks on an element to open a context menu
copy: Occurs when the user copies the content of an element
cut: Occurs when the user cuts the content of an element
dblclick: Occurs when an element is double-clicked
drag: Occurs when an element is being dragged
dragend: Occurs when the user has finished dragging an element
dragenter: Occurs when the dragged element enters the drop target
dragleave: Occurs when the dragged element leaves the drop target
dragover: Occurs when the dragged element is over the drop target
dragstart: Occurs when the user starts to drag an element
drop: Occurs when the dragged element is dropped on the drop target
durationchange: Occurs when the duration of the audio/video is changed
ended: Occurs when the audio/video has ended playing
error: Occurs when an error occurs while loading an external file (like
focus: Occurs when an element gets focus
focusin: Occurs when an element is about to get focus
focusout: Occurs when an element is about to lose focus
fullscreenchange: Occurs when an element is displayed in full-screen mode
fullscreenerror: Occurs when an element can not be displayed in full-screen mode
hashchange: Occurs when there has been changes to the anchor part of a URL
input: Occurs when an element gets user input
invalid: Occurs when an element is invalid
keydown: Occurs when a user is pressing a key
keypress: Occurs when a user presses a key
keyup: Occurs when a user releases a key
load: Occurs when an object has loaded
loadeddata: Occurs when media data is loaded
loadedmetadata: Occurs when meta data (like dimensions and duration) are loaded
loadstart: Occurs when the browser starts looking for the specified media
message: Occurs when a message is received through the event source
mousedown: Occurs when a user presses a mouse button over an element
mousemove: Occurs when the pointer is moving while it is over an element
mouseout: Occurs when the pointer is moving out of an element
mouseover: Occurs when the pointer is moved onto an element
mouseup: Occurs when a user releases a mouse button over an element
offline: Occurs when the browser starts to work offline
online: Occurs when the browser starts to work online
open: Occurs when a connection with event source is opened
pagehide: Occurs when the user navigates away from a webpage
pageshow: Occurs when the user navigates to a webpage
paste: Occurs when the user pastes some content in an element
playing: Occurs when media is playing after having been paused or stopped for buffering
pointercancel: Occurs when the pointer device button is released while the pointer is over an element
pointerdown: Occurs when the pointer device button is pressed over an element
pointerenter: Occurs when the pointer is moved onto an element
pointerleave: Occurs when the pointer is moved out of an element
pointermove: Occurs when the pointer is moved while it is over an element
pointerout: Occurs when the pointer is moved out of an element
pointerover: Occurs when the pointer is moved onto an element
pointerup: Occurs when the pointer device button is released over an element
progress: Occurs when the browser is in the process of getting the media data
ratechange: Occurs when the playing speed of the media is changed
reset: Occurs when a form is reset
resize: Occurs when the size of the browser window is changed
scroll: Occurs when an element's scrollbar is being scrolled
search: Occurs when the user writes something in a search field
seeked: Occurs when the user is finished moving/skipping to a new position in the media
seeking: Occurs when the user starts moving/skipping to a new position in the media
select: Occurs when some text is selected
selectionchange: Occurs when the selection has changed in the document
selectstart: Occurs when the user starts to select some text
stalled: Occurs when the browser is trying to get media data, but data is not available
submit: Occurs when a form is submitted
suspend: Occurs when the browser is intentionally not getting media data
timeupdate: Occurs when the current playback position has changed
toggle: Occurs when a checkbox or a radio button is checked or unchecked
touchcancel: Occurs when a touch event is interrupted
touchend: Occurs when a finger is removed from a touch screen
touchmove: Occurs when a finger is dragged along a touch screen
touchstart: Occurs when a finger is placed on a touch screen
transitionend: Occurs when a CSS transition has completed
unload: Occurs once a page has unloaded (or the browser window has been closed)
volumechange: Occurs when the volume of the media has changed (includes setting the volume to 'mute')
waiting: Occurs when the video stops because it needs to buffer the next frame
wheel: Occurs when the mouse wheel rolls up or down over an element
